Hi there! A chatbot is a virtual assistant that simulates human conversations, allowing you to interact with your customers automatically. Hereâ€™s how it can benefit your cookie business:
  • 24/7 Customer Support: Answer questions about your cookie varieties, ingredients, and pricing anytime.
  • Order Management: Facilitate order placements, modifications, and cancellations directly through the chatbot.
  • Personalized Recommendations: Suggest cookies based on customer preferences, enhancing their shopping experience.

Yes, you can sell cookies directly through the chatbot! Hereâ€™s how it works and where you can deploy it:
  • Direct Sales: Customers can place orders, modify them, or cancel directly through the chatbot.
  • Deployment Channels: You can integrate the chatbot on your website, mobile apps, and messaging platforms like WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, and more.
The phone number for 1MillionBot is (+34) 623 02 57 67. If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out! ðŸ˜Š
